title: The Writer's Almanac - Thursday, April 30, 2020
description: Charles Dickens' “A Tale of Two Cities” was first published in serial form on this date in 1859. The weekly journal it appeared in sold 125,000 copies.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Charles Dickens' “A Tale of Two Cities” was first published in serial form on this date in 1859. The weekly journal it appeared in sold 125,000 copies.
